verses.1: Vantungah a om pa aw, nangmah kong en to hi.
verses.2: Nasem pasalte in a topa uh muang a, nasem numeite in a tonu uh a muan mah bangin ko tungah hehpihna nong neih matengin Topa kote º Pasian kong mitsuan uh hi.
verses.3: Kote hong hehpih in. Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote in ka thuak zawh loh uh simmawhna ka thuak uh hi.
verses.4: A ututin a gamta mite in kote a hong zahkona, a kiphasak mite in hong simmawh bawlna hangin ka gim thuakna uh sauvei lua khinta hi.
